name: test
javadoc:
/**
 * Tests whether a code point is either a lowercase letter, an uppercase letter, or an Arabic numeral.
 *
 * @param codePoint the Unicode code point to test
 * @return true if the code point represents a lowercase letter, an uppercase letter, or an Arabic numeral; false otherwise
 */
improved_javadoc:
/**
 * Tests whether a Unicode code point represents a lowercase letter, an uppercase letter, or an Arabic numeral.
 *
 * @param codePoint the Unicode code point to test
 * @return true if the code point represents a valid character (lowercase letter, uppercase letter, or Arabic numeral); false otherwise
 */
